REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2423 reute h f BC-BALTEK-<BTEK.O>-BUYS 10-19 0049

TEXT.TITLE: BALTEK <BTEK.O> BUYS ECUADORIAN PLANT
TEXT.BODY: Baltek Corp said it has acquired a shrimp packing plant in Ecuador for undisclosed terms. The company said the acquisition will result in a tripling of its Ecuadorian shrimp sales to about three mln pounds annually by 1988. Reuter
